item.title: c#从命令中获取输出实时显示在控件中
item.description: A brief description of what the code performs in this example: The shell command (cmd.exe) is run first, using start /WAIT as parameter. More or less the same functionality as /k : the console is started without any specific task, waiting to process a command when one is sent. StandardOutput, StandardError and StandardInput are all redirected, setting RedirectStandardOutput, RedirectStandardError and RedirectStandardInput properties of the ProcessStartInfo to true. The console Output
